Constructor Detail

GenerateRationaleReport

public GenerateRationaleReport(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display,
                               java.lang.Object selection)
Constructs The Rationale Report Generator Preview Window And ALlows the user to accept or reject the generated rationale report before sending it to a file.

Parameters:
display - the window manager wrapper interface which can be used to construct the Rationale Report Preview Window
selection - The Select Nodes In The Rationale Tree View
